reviews.review_msg: Wayne is super chill. Books that he chose for the course were really interesting. He's really clear about what he wants for the essays, and if you show up to class, you'll know exactly what he's looking for. The whole class is participation (20%) + 3 essays (80%), and the essays are short (6-8 pages). Cool guy, very informal teaching style.
The best prof I have ever had in SFU, make sure you don't miss this one.
